properties.name: imported
properties.description: If true, the style was imported from another document. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique ID of the CharacterStyle.

properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent of the CharacterStyle (a Document, Application or CharacterStyleGroup).

properties.name: index
properties.description: The index of the CharacterStyle within its containing object.

properties.name: styleExportTagMaps
properties.description: A collection of style export tag maps.

properties.name: events
properties.description: A collection of events.

properties.name: eventListeners
properties.description: A collection of event listeners.

properties.name: basedOn
properties.description: The style that this style is based on. Can return: CharacterStyle or String.

properties.name: appliedFont
properties.description: The font applied to the CharacterStyle, specified as either a font object or the name of font family. Can return: Font, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: fontStyle
properties.description: The name of the font style. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: pointSize
properties.description: The text size. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: leading
properties.description: The leading applied to the text. Can return: Unit, Leading enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kerningMethod
properties.description: The type of pair kerning. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: tracking
properties.description: The amount by which to loosen or tighten a block of text, specified in thousands of an em. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: capitalization
properties.description: The capitalization scheme. Can return: Capitalization enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: position
properties.description: The text position relative to the baseline. Can return: Position enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: underline
properties.description: If true, underlines the text. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: strikeThru
properties.description: If true, draws a strikethrough line through the text. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: ligatures
properties.description: If true, replaces specific character combinations (e.g., fl, fi) with ligature characters. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: noBreak
properties.description: If true, keeps the text on the same line. . Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: horizontalScale
properties.description: The horizontal scaling applied to the CharacterStyle. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: verticalScale
properties.description: The vertical scaling applied to the CharacterStyle. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: baselineShift
properties.description: The baseline shift applied to the text. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: skew
properties.description: The skew angle of the CharacterStyle. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: fillTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the fill color of the CharacterStyle. (To specify a tint percentage, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: strokeTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the stroke color of the CharacterStyle. (To specify a tint percentage, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: strokeWeight
properties.description: The stroke weight applied to the characters of the text. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: overprintStroke
properties.description: If true, the stroke of the characters will overprint. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: overprintFill
properties.description: If true, the fill color of the characters will overprint. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfFigureStyle
properties.description: The figure style in OpenType fonts. Can return: OTFFigureStyle enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfOrdinal
properties.description: If true, uses ordinals in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfFraction
properties.description: If true, uses fractions in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfDiscretionaryLigature
properties.description: If true, uses discretionary ligatures in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfTitling
properties.description: If true, uses titling forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfContextualAlternate
properties.description: If true, uses contextual alternate forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfSwash
properties.description: If true, uses swash forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: underlineColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the underline stroke. . Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: underlineGapColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of the underline stroke. Note: Valid when underline type is not solid. Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: underlineTint
properties.description: The underline stroke tint (as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: underlineGapTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the gap color of the underline stroke. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when underline type is not solid. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: underlineOverprint
properties.description: If true, the underline stroke color will overprint. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: underlineGapOverprint
properties.description: If true, the gap color of the underline stroke will overprint. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: underlineType
properties.description: The stroke type of the underline stroke. Can return: StrokeStyle, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: underlineOffset
properties.description: The amount by which to offset the underline from the text baseline. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: underlineWeight
properties.description: The stroke weight of the underline stroke. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: strikeThroughColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the strikethrough stroke. Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: strikeThroughGapColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of the strikethrough stroke. Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: strikeThroughTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the strikethrough stroke. (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: strikeThroughGapTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the strikethrough stroke gap color. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when strike through type is not solid. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: strikeThroughOverprint
properties.description: If true, the strikethrough stroke will overprint. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: strikeThroughGapOverprint
properties.description: If true, the gap color of the strikethrough stroke will overprint. Note: Valid when strike through type is not solid. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: strikeThroughType
properties.description: The stroke type of the strikethrough stroke. Can return: StrokeStyle, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: strikeThroughOffset
properties.description: The amount by which to offset the strikethrough stroke from the text baseline. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: strikeThroughWeight
properties.description: The stroke weight of the strikethrough stroke. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: fillColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of the CharacterStyle. . Can return: Swatch or NothingEnum enumerator. Can also accept: String.

properties.name: strokeColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of the CharacterStyle. Can return: Swatch or NothingEnum enumerator. Can also accept: String.

properties.name: appliedLanguage
properties.description: The language of the text. Can return: LanguageWithVendors, Language or NothingEnum enumerator. Can also accept: String.

properties.name: splitDocument
properties.description: Split Document (EPUB only). Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: emitCss
properties.description: Emit CSS. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: styleUniqueId
properties.description: A unique id that can be assigned to a style. This can be used to differentiate between the styles. Internal use only. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: includeClass
properties.description: If true, class attribute will be generated for the style. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: designAxes
properties.description: Value of Design Axes. Can return: Array of Reals or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfSlashedZero
properties.description: If true, use a slashed zeroes in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfHistorical
properties.description: If true, use historical forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfStylisticSets
properties.description: The stylistic sets to use in OpenType fonts. Can return: Long Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: gradientFillLength
properties.description: The length (for a linear gradient) or radius (for a radial gradient) applied to the fill of the text. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: gradientFillAngle
properties.description: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the fill of the text. (Range: -180 to 180). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: gradientStrokeLength
properties.description: The length (for a linear gradient) or radius (for a radial gradient) applied to the stroke of the text. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: gradientStrokeAngle
properties.description: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the stroke of the text. (Range: -180 to 180). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: gradientFillStart
properties.description: The starting point (in page coordinates) of a gradient applied to the fill of the text, in the format [x, y]. Can return: Array of 2 Units or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: gradientStrokeStart
properties.description: The starting point (in page coordinates) of a gradient applied to the stroke of the text, in the format [x, y]. Can return: Array of 2 Units or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfMark
properties.description: If true, uses mark positioning in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfLocale
properties.description: If true, uses localized forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: positionalForm
properties.description: The OpenType positional form. Can return: PositionalForms enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the style.

properties.name: previewColor
properties.description: The color to use for preview, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: miterLimit
properties.description: The limit of the ratio of stroke width to miter length before a miter (pointed) join becomes a bevel (squared-off) join. Can return: Real (0 - 1000) or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: strokeAlignment
properties.description: The stroke alignment applied to the text. Can return: TextStrokeAlign enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: endJoin
properties.description: The stroke join type applied to the characters of the text. Can return: OutlineJoin enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfOverlapSwash
properties.description: If true, use overlapping swash forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfStylisticAlternate
properties.description: If true, use stylistic alternate forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfJustificationAlternate
properties.description: If true, use alternate justification forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfStretchedAlternate
properties.description: If true, use stretched alternate forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: characterDirection
properties.description: The direction of the character. Can return: CharacterDirectionOptions enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: keyboardDirection
properties.description: The keyboard direction of the character. Can return: CharacterDirectionOptions enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: digitsType
properties.description: The digits type. Can return: DigitsTypeOptions enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kashidas
properties.description: Use of Kashidas for justification. Can return: KashidasOptions enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: diacriticPosition
properties.description: Position of diacriticical characters. Can return: DiacriticPositionOptions enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: xOffsetDiacritic
properties.description: The x (horizontal) offset for diacritic adjustment. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: yOffsetDiacritic
properties.description: The y (vertical) offset for diacritic adjustment. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: characterAlignment
properties.description: The alignment of small characters to the largest character in the line. Can return: CharacterAlignment enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: tsume
properties.description: The amount of horizontal character compression. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: leadingAki
properties.description: The amount of space before each character. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: trailingAki
properties.description: The amount of space after each character. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: characterRotation
properties.description: The rotation angle (in degrees) of individual characters. Note: The rotation is counterclockwise. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: jidori
properties.description: The number of grid squares in which to arrange the text. . Can return: Short Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: shataiMagnification
properties.description: The amount (as a percentage) of shatai obliquing to apply. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: shataiDegreeAngle
properties.description: The shatai lens angle (in degrees). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: shataiAdjustRotation
properties.description: If true, applies shatai rotation. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: shataiAdjustTsume
properties.description: If true, adjusts shatai tsume. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: tatechuyoko
properties.description: If true, makes the character horizontal in vertical text. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: tatechuyokoXOffset
properties.description: The horizontal offset for horizontal characters in vertical text. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: tatechuyokoYOffset
properties.description: The vertical offset for horizontal characters in vertical text. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenFillColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of kenten characters. Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenStrokeColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of kenten characters. Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenTint
properties.description: The fill tint (as a percentage) of kenten characters. (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenStrokeTint
properties.description: The stroke tint (as a percentage) of kenten characters. (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenWeight
properties.description: The stroke weight (in points) of kenten characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenOverprintFill
properties.description: The method of overprinting the kenten fill. Can return: AdornmentOverprint enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenOverprintStroke
properties.description: The method of overprinting the kenten stroke. Can return: AdornmentOverprint enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenKind
properties.description: The style of kenten characters. Can return: KentenCharacter enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenPlacement
properties.description: The distance between kenten characters and their parent characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenAlignment
properties.description: The alignment of kenten characters relative to the parent characters. . Can return: KentenAlignment enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenPosition
properties.description: The kenten position relative to the parent character. Can return: RubyKentenPosition enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenFont
properties.description: The font to use for kenten characters. Can return: Font, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenFontStyle
properties.description: The font style of kenten characters. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenFontSize
properties.description: The size (in points) of kenten characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenXScale
properties.description: The horizontal size of kenten characters as a percent of the original size. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenYScale
properties.description: The vertical size of kenten charachers as a percent of the original size. . Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenCustomCharacter
properties.description: The character used for kenten. Note: Valid only when kenten kind is custom. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenCharacterSet
properties.description: The character set used for the custom kenten character. Note: Valid only when kenten kind is custom. . Can return: KentenCharacterSet enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyFill
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of ruby characters. Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyStroke
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of ruby characters. Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the ruby fill color. (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyWeight
properties.description: The stroke weight (in points) of ruby characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyOverprintFill
properties.description: The method of overprinting the ruby fill. Can return: AdornmentOverprint enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyOverprintStroke
properties.description: The method of overprinting the ruby stroke. Can return: AdornmentOverprint enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyStrokeTint
properties.description: The stroke tint (as a percentage) of ruby characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyFont
properties.description: The font applied to ruby characters. Can return: Font, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyFontStyle
properties.description: The font style of ruby characters. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyFontSize
properties.description: The size (in points) of ruby characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyOpenTypePro
properties.description: If true, uses OpenType Pro fonts for ruby. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyXScale
properties.description: The horizontal size of ruby characters, specified as a percent of the original size. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyYScale
properties.description: The vertical size of ruby characters, specified as a percent of the original size. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyType
properties.description: The ruby type. Can return: RubyTypes enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyAlignment
properties.description: The ruby alignment. Can return: RubyAlignments enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyPosition
properties.description: The position of ruby characters relative to the parent text. Can return: RubyKentenPosition enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyXOffset
properties.description: The amount of horizontal space between ruby and parent characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyYOffset
properties.description: The amount of vertical space between ruby and parent characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyParentSpacing
properties.description: The ruby spacing relative to the parent text. . Can return: RubyParentSpacing enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyAutoAlign
properties.description: If true, auto aligns ruby. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyOverhang
properties.description: If true, constrains ruby overhang to the specified amount. For information on specifying an amount, see ruby parent overhang amount. . Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyAutoScaling
properties.description: If true, automatically scales ruby to the specified percent of parent text size. For information on specifying a percent, see ruby parent scaling percent. . Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyParentScalingPercent
properties.description: The amount (as a percentage) to scale the parent text size to determine the ruby text size. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyParentOverhangAmount
properties.description: The amount by which ruby characters can overhang the parent text. Can return: RubyOverhang enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: warichu
properties.description: If true, turns on warichu. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: warichuSize
properties.description: The amount (as a percentage) to scale parent text size to determine warichu size. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: warichuLines
properties.description: The number of lines of warichu within a single normal line. Can return: Short Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: warichuLineSpacing
properties.description: The gap between lines of warichu characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: warichuAlignment
properties.description: The warichu alignment. Can return: WarichuAlignment enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: warichuCharsAfterBreak
properties.description: The minimum number of characters allowed after a line break. . Can return: Short Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: warichuCharsBeforeBreak
properties.description: The minimum number of characters allowed before a line break. Can return: Short Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfProportionalMetrics
properties.description: If true, kerns according to proportional CJK metrics in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfHVKana
properties.description: If true, switches hiragana fonts, which have different glyphs for horizontal and vertical. . Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: otfRomanItalics
properties.description: If true, applies italics to half-width alphanumerics. . Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: scaleAffectsLineHeight
properties.description: If true, the line changes size when characters are scaled. . Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: cjkGridTracking
properties.description: If true, uses grid tracking to track non-Roman characters in CJK grids. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: glyphForm
properties.description: The glyph variant to substitute for standard glyphs. Can return: AlternateGlyphForms enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyAutoTcyDigits
properties.description: The number of digits included in auto tcy (tate-chuu-yoko) in ruby. Can return: Short Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyAutoTcyIncludeRoman
properties.description: If true, includes Roman characters in auto tcy (tate-chuu-yoko) in ruby. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyAutoTcyAutoScale
properties.description: If true, automatically scales glyphs in auto tcy (tate-chuu-yoko) in ruby to fit one em. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: label
properties.description: A property that can be set to any string.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

methods.name: setNthDesignAxis
methods.description: Set Nth design axis of a variable font.

parameters.name: replacingWith
parameters.description: The style to apply in place of the deleted style. (Optional)

methods.name: move

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The location relative to the reference object or within the containing object.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: The reference object. Note: Required when the to parameter specifies before or after. Can accept: ParagraphStyle, ParagraphStyleGroup, CharacterStyle, CharacterStyleGroup, CellStyle, CellStyleGroup, TableStyle, TableStyleGroup, Document or Application. (Optional)

methods.description: Moves the style to the specified location.

methods.name: createThumbnailWithProperties

parameters.name: space
parameters.description: Color space RGB, CMYK or LAB

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The path to the export file.

methods.description: Create thumbnail for selected text with the given properties.

methods.name: insertLabel
methods.description: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

methods.name: extractLabel
methods.description: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the CharacterStyle.

methods.name: getElements
methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
